other_tests.findings: Thinning of the entire cornea and a heterogeneous and mildly elevated stromal layer density.

Increased corneal curvature in both eyes, maximum keratometric power of 50.5 D in the right eye and 50.60 D in the left eye, minimum corneal thickness of 285 µm in the right eye and 280 µm in the left eye, with astigmatism measured.
Significant increase in optical density in the 2-mm central area of the cornea; right eye: 29.3 grayscale units; left eye: 30.6 grayscale units.

Corneal epithelial cell morphology disturbed, disordered nerve fibers under the basal cells, significant reduction in anterior stromal cell count, thicker than average corneal stromal nerves, nuclei of the posterior stromal cells showed uneven size distribution.
Homozygous mutation in PRDM5; NM_018699.2:c.247C > T(p.Arg83Cys) detected.
